curam.util.ctm.bom

Class BOMPostUpsertMethodInvoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BOMPostUpsertMethodInvoker

  • public class BOMPostUpsertMethodInvoker
extends java.lang.Object
    The class modularizes the invocation call the happens after the update/insert operation for a business object module for the purpose of deleting unwanted child entities for a given business object instance..

    This class performs the operation of deleting the unwanted child entities that exists for a given BusinessObjectIdentifier. Identification of unwanted child entities will be automatically done by the infrastructure code after comparing the data content of a BusinessObjectIdentifier that exists in the change set and the equivalent database snapshot. This removal of child entities will happen after update/insert operation for a given BOM implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public void invoke(ReadAndUpsertBOM bomObject,
                   BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
                   org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
        Invokes the method deleteChildEntities, if defined, on the BOM implementation classes. If the method is not defined, then the call to the method will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        bomObject - The object representing the BOM instance.
        boIdentifier - The business object identifier object that uniquely identifies a business object instance.
        boDocument - The XML document representing the business object content.
        Throws:
        AppException - Because of the usage of reflection, any method throwing an exception will be wrapped and be will be re-thrown as AppException.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
